item.title: WaaS
item.description: Waas Description: Writing as a Service! Authors: NoobMaster + NoobHacker Points: 491 Solve: 78 Introduction WaaS (Writing as a Service) allows us to overwrite a file on the system (after some input validation) and insert anything (until a newline is met) we want in it. import subprocess from base64 import b64decode as d while True: print("[1] Write to a file\n[2] Get the flag\n[3] Exit") try: inp = int(input("Choice: ").strip()) except: print("Invalid input!
